alert.note: Alert for Ellis; Kaufman (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 24 at 9:32PM CST until December 26 at 1:13PM CST by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Fort Worth TX has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Texas... Chambers Creek Near Rice affecting Navarro County. Trinity River Near Rosser affecting Kaufman and Ellis Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING TO EARLY TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Trinity River near Rosser. * WHEN...From Monday morning to early Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 31.0 feet, Minor flooding of farm and ranch land is expected near the river. A few rural roads will be inundated. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 PM CST Sunday the stage was 22.2 feet. - Bankfull stage is 31.0 feet. - Flood stage is 31.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tomorrow morning to a crest of 31.6 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall below flood stage early Tuesday morning. &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/fwd.
